DOC.brief_summary: Documentation of the effect of an direct or overlapping switch from another dopamine agonist to Sifrol® on motor function, psychopathological disturbances and mood, assessment of the reasons for the switch and the reasons for using Sifrol®, equivalent doses at the end of the switch and tolerability of Sifrol® in ambulatory patients suffering from idiopathic Parkinson's disease under routine conditions
DOC.brief_title: Post Marketing Surveillance Study in Patients With Idiopathic Parkinson's Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients with Idiopathic Parkinson's disease who are planned to undergo a switch from another dopamine agonist to Sifrol® Neurologists and psychiatrists are asked to consider the Summary of Product Characteristics (SPC) for Sifrol®
